title: no ranked 3?
body: me and my friends are trying to play ranked 3s but the option isnt there exPLAIN

replies.body:
As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, Ranked Team matches are only enabled during specific hours during the week, and a different set of hours on the weekends.

Check out the schedule [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule) for all regions. Let me know if you have any other questions.
Ranked teams (both 3s and 5s) are only available at certain times of the day. On NA, they are available from 4pm to midnight PDT on weekdays and 2pm to midnight PDT on weekends.
